Package com.ovoc01.app.core.build

Class QueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.ovoc01.app.core.build.QueryBuilder
public class QueryBuilder extends Object
The QueryBuilder class provides methods to construct SQL queries for various database operations, such as inserting, selecting, updating, and deleting records in a database. It also assists in constructing queries for viewing database records through specified views.

    • viewQuery

      public String viewQuery(DtbObjectAccess object, Field view) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalAccessException
      Constructs a SQL SELECT query for viewing records through a specified view.
      Parameters:
      object - The DtbObjectAccess object representing the view.
      view - The view Field for which to construct the query.
      Returns:
      The SQL SELECT query for the view as a string.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the argument is illegal or null.
      IllegalAccessException - If access to a class is denied.
